bear.name: Garlon Eldair
bear.description: A famous fighter, on the peak of his career, he is rather a mystery. It is known that he is not much of a talker. He is known for biting off his opponents ear. As he moves on the ring he seems clumpsy, but in reality he is very agile.
bear.descriptionAdd: Your agents also found out that he really likes to sleep almost through the whole weekend. If he does not have a match that is.

fox.name: Amelina Glauss
fox.description: An actress who just got her 5th award. She is known not only for her looks and acting but also for being rather smart. She is sly and, some say, ruthless. Her words are always known to have a double meaning.
fox.descriptionAdd: She likes to wear outfits with fur collar.

elephant.name: Deglon Prumt
elephant.description: Very big and rather fat man. he is an owner and director of a company that makes hoses and tubes. He is very good at making all others feel minor and irrelevant.
elephant.descriptionAdd: When he was young his rivals shop was mysteriosly ruined.

snake.name: Grauss Kornificus
snake.description: A very smart and cunning mafia boss. It feels really uneasy when he is looking at you. It feels like he knows what you are thinking.
snake.descriptionAdd: He is said to have used poison to kill those who left his gang.

sokol.name: Al Bein
sokol.description: Now a general, he was a famous pilot.
sokol.descriptionAdd: It is known that he once survived a crash without any injuries.

fly.name: Dalran Monar
fly.description: A journalist wide known for taking a big role in the last political campaign. He likes to look for gossip, and to bring out in his articles.
fly.descriptionAdd: Evryone who spent more than a week with him said that he was the annoying person they ever met.

spider.name: Perishal Moln
spider.description: Archbishop, who is known as one of the most influential celebrities of our time. He has the power over people hearts if not minds. But those, who play the game of power say he is someone you should watch out for.
spider.descriptionAdd: He likes to drink juice before going to bed.

lion.name: Garold Torion
lion.description: President of an international bank. Evryone around him feels how noble and greatfull he is. He is a great orator who has a voice filled with power.
lion.descriptionAdd: He has long red hair that does down to his shoulders.
